name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max
desc: The ultimate flagship experience with a triple-lens camera and stunning OLED display. Features the A17 Bionic chip.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 FE
desc: A powerful and affordable option featuring fast charging and a durable, sleek design. Excellent value for money.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
desc: Next-generation Tensor G3 chip and a massive focus on AI and computational photography. Unmatched software performance.

name: Xiaomi 13 Lite
desc: Designed for portability, this compact phone doesn't compromise on battery life or processing speed. Very thin design.

name: OnePlus 11 Pro
desc: A gaming powerhouse with an incredibly smooth 120Hz refresh rate display and blazing-fast charging speed.

name: Motorola G Power 2023
desc: Reliable and easy to use, ideal for basic communication and essential apps. Famous for its multi-day battery life.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold5
desc: Revolutionary foldable technology turning your phone into a tablet instantly. Perfect for multitasking and productivity.

name: Apple iPhone SE (3rd Gen)
desc: The smallest device in the current Apple lineup, featuring A15 Bionic performance in a pocket-friendly shell.

name: Samsung Galaxy XCover 6 Pro
desc: Built for the outdoors with extreme durability, water resistance, and user-replaceable battery for field work.

name: Sony Xperia 1 V
desc: Focuses purely on media consumption with a stunning 4K OLED display and powerful stereo speakers. Great for filmmakers.

name: Apple iPhone 15
desc: The standard model of the iPhone series, offering premium features with the Dynamic Island and USB-C port.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24+
desc: A premium device with enhanced processing power and improved AI features powered by Galaxy AI.

name: Nokia G22
desc: An entry-level device designed for self-repairability, covering all the necessities for daily communication.

name: Google Pixel 7a
desc: Incredibly thin and light, making it a stylish choice without sacrificing performance or screen size. Mid-range champ.

name: Asus ROG Phone 8 Pro
desc: The ultimate high-performance chipset and a smooth display make this a great all-around phone for competitive mobile gamers.
